trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_SEQ_00<tab>Alisaie has only one thing on her mind.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Alisaie at Maelstrom Command.

TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_GRAHATIA_100_000<tab>Alas, the Ironworks crew couldn't linger long─far too much to do. Yet brief though our time together was, it was <var 1A 02 /var>bloody<var 1A 01 /var> good to see them!
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALISAIE_000_000<tab>At long last, we have our cure...
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_GRAHATIA_100_001<tab>In theory, at any rate. We cannot be certain until such time as we put it to the proof, but I am quietly confident.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALISAIE_100_002<tab>Well, if we're to test it on someone, then I suggest Ga Bu. His symptoms are relatively mild.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_A1_000_001<tab>It'll be fine, I'm sure of it.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_A1_000_002<tab>As long as you exercise due caution...
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALISAIE_100_003<tab>Yes. As long as we exercise due caution, it will be fine.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALISAIE_100_004<tab>Without further ado, then, let's make for Limsa. We've kept Ga Bu waiting long enough!
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_KRILE_000_010<tab>I doubt I could contribute much towards what comes next, so I shall cheer you on from afar. Best of luck with the treatment.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_TATARU_000_011<tab>We'll all be praying for your success!
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_GRAHATIA_000_012<tab>'Tis plain Alisaie is very fond of Ga Bu. To the extent that I have a hand in it, I shall do all in my power to bring him back.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALISAIE_000_013<tab>Well, this is the moment of truth. I'll have our hosts bring Ga Bu to us at once.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_YSHTOLA_000_014<tab>Alisaie will succeed, I am certain of it. We need but have faith.
TEXT_LUCKMJ104_04010_ALPHINAUD_000_015<tab>Well, this seems as good a spot as any to have a rest.
